assign.name: T6A1 Assignment: Post-Course Self-Assessment
assign.intro:
Post Course Self-Assessment Survey

In the first lesson, you took a pre-course self-assessment to gauge your level of general assessment knowledge prior to completing this course.  Now we ask you to:

  1. take the post course self-assessment, and
  2. review the results of your learning by comparing your pre- and post-assessment documents.

Please follow these steps to complete and upload your post-course self-assessment for facilitator review.

Step 1) Locate and review your responses on your Pre-Assessment Document (this should be saved to your local computer, or you can access it under Topic 1: Upload Your Pre-Course Self-Assessment).

Step 2) Download and save one version of the blank self-assessment document linked below to a known location on your computer.

Assessment Basics Post-Course-Self-Assessment (.rtf format with table)

Assessment Basics Post-Course Self-Assessment (docx format - without table)

Step 3) Type your responses into the self-assessment document and again, SAVE your work to your computer.

Step 4) Upload and Save your completed survey to the course:

  1. Click on the "Add Submission" button below.
  2. Click and drag your file into the File Submissions box to upload it to the course.
    (or click on the document upload button in the upper left of the file submissions box, and follow instructions to identify and upload the file).
  3. Click on the Save Changes button below the file submissions box to complete the process.
    NOTE: if you skip this step, your document will NOT be in the system and this activity will not be complete.

NOTE: Your self-assessment assignment is NOT submitted until you CLICK ON the Save Changes button below.

Only you or your facilitator will be able to view your uploaded self-assessment.

Once You Have Submitted Your Self-Assessment:

Click on an Intro-Assessment-ABE link at the top (or at left under "my Courses") to return to the Course Outline and access the next course activity.
